sentences.en: Discriminatory trade barriers, those treating foreigners differently, have their own interesting kinds of effects.
sentences.cn: 歧视性的贸易壁垒, 即对外国人区别对待的那种贸易壁垒, 有其特有的,值得注意的种种影响.

sentences.en: In sum, protective labor laws for women are discriminatory and do not meet their intended purpose.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 为妇女制定的劳动保护法是带有歧视性的,而且并没达到它们预期的目的.

sentences.en: It is illegal for a buyer to knowingly induce or accept a discriminatory price.
sentences.cn: 采购有意引诱,或接受价格歧视则是违法的行为.

sentences.en: Most state legislation is neither proprietary nor discriminatory, and thus falls into the third class.
sentences.cn: 大多数州立法既非专有性的,也不是歧视性的, 所以应归为第三类.

sentences.en: Non - discriminatory application of the VAT and other internal taxes was deemed essential.
sentences.cn: 增值税和其他国内税的 非 歧视实施被认为是必需的.

sentences.en: Only with a non - discriminatory mind, will peace be realized.
sentences.cn: 只有用 非 歧视性的思维, 才能实现和平.

sentences.en: Protection for domestic industry is admittedly discriminatory.
sentences.cn: 保护本国工业是种名正言顺的歧视.

sentences.en: Subscriber may not present the Information rendered in any unfair, misleading, or discriminatory format.
sentences.cn: 订阅者不可以提供任何不公平 、 误导 、 差别对待的资讯.

sentences.en: The final product color and size in order to prevail in kind ( generally non - discriminatory ).
sentences.cn: 商品的最终颜色及尺寸以实物为准 ( 一般无差别 ).

sentences.en: The new legislation is highly discriminatory.
sentences.cn: 新的法案,有许多地方厚此薄彼.

sentences.en: The new legislation is highy discriminatory.
sentences.cn: 新的法案有许多地方厚此薄彼.

sentences.en: Therefore, all stimulus measures should be at the very least non discriminatory and rule based.
sentences.cn: 因此, 所有经济刺激举措最起码应该做到不含歧视性和以规则为基础.

sentences.en: This fully reflects the special safeguard measures discriminatory.
sentences.cn: 这充分地体现出特保措施的歧视性.

sentences.en: This makes it a discriminatory law and unacceptable under the Commerce Clause.
sentences.cn: 这使它成为一项歧视性的法律和不可接受根据商务条款.

sentences.en: Zhao Zhicheng: For the price index, which is discriminatory prices.
sentences.cn: 赵志成: 对于定价指数化, 这其实是歧视性价格.

words.tran_cn: 识别的；有差别的；有识别力的
区别的，歧视的；有识别力的

trans.tran_en: treating a person or a group of people differently from other people, in an unfair way
